author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Try our easy to follow Curried Chickpeas With Mango recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Curried Chickpeas With Mango Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 handful fresh mint leaves, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: First, make the dressing. In a jug, whisk together the oil and vinegar, then add the sugar and curry powder. Season with salt and black pepper.
Put the chickpeas, mango, red onion, and almonds in a bowl, and mix through. Pour over the dressing, and stir together. Just before serving, stir in the fresh mint leaves.
